name: Be Water
description:
Be Water is a charming and calming narrative puzzle platformer in which you play as a drop of water who longs to be with a houseplant on the other side of a vacant apartment.

Players must switch between and use the physical properties of water (Liquid, Solid, & Gas) in order to platform across various household objects and reach your one true love, the flower hibiscus.

Players can explore the colorful world of Be Water, talk with expressive NPCs, all while striving to see how this fated love story will end.
